CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1953 reads: "Red Cross Course Graduates - These nurse aides have completed their course in Home Nursing and Civil Defense and are prepared for attacks, man-made or natural. Mrs. Eunice W. Cook was the instructor.  Pictured, left to right: Mrs. Rachel Kane, Mrs. Elinore Tramel, Mrs. Sallie Brown, Mrs. Anna Johnson, Mrs. Mary Tebch, Mrs. Elnora Allen, Mrs. Evelyn Waters, Mrs. Mabel Ford and Mrs. Bessie Powell-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Eighteen nurses left to right; Rachel Kane, Elinore Tramel, Sallie Brown, Anna Johnson, Mary Tebch, Elnora Allen, Evelyn Waters, Mabel Ford and Bessie Powell, Eunice Cook in center, graduates from the Home Nursing and Civil Defense course
